very close to the Circle of Willis.

- Day-long team-building trips that take New Yorkers

The tickets are also expensive and non-refundable.
Fine, but I only do Zelle.

to venture off into the wild?

with the people who are actually in my life.
And after everything that you have been going through,
- It is very different, but everything
is packed and prepared and ready to go

Tent, so maybe we could, uh, you know,
I guess divorce comes down to these little sticky notes.

Throw on a backpack, amigo, because I am taking you

I don't even know if I want to be in the same city as her.
- 'Cause you don't want to be tempted?
I just found out Luna has a peanut allergy,
so naturally I purge the whole house of all peanuts,
all peanut butter, because even though she knows that it could
make her stop breathing, she still loves it,
So the only thing to do is to remove it completely
so it doesn't, you know, kill her.
Max, look, I got a big surgery so I'm going to have to pass,
but I understand and fully support you
getting the hell out of here.
Get ready for the Great Escape, right?

designed for X-rays and should offer you

We need to build a fire.

but he's also kind of douche.
- Hey, uh, is your family anywhere nearby?

it would be like me going to see

I mean, you ran away, hung out in a park for four hours,
and then you went right back,

I didn't want to say goodbye to those things forever.
I realised that was the price of a better life.
Sometimes it's scary to walk away from the good things,

you have to leave something behind.
